channel.title: Velox on Algorithms & Maps
channel.description: Recent content in Velox on Algorithms & Maps

item.title: Maps for fun I: choropleth and cartograms
item.author: csaybar@gmail.com (Cesar Aybar)
item.description: 1. Intro Everybody loves geospatial visualization but sometimes is difficult to make them. This is the first of a series of ten tutorials are meant to provide a rough a gentle introduction about spatial/statistical tools available in the R. Core: Choropleth maps in plotly. Creating Cartograms in R. Geospatial animations with plotly. Web maps with Leaflet. Widget interactions with Crosstalk. Interactive Mapping with Shiny.
